[ Test 1: Type Conversion ]
    FLOAT 01000000_01011100_11001100_11001101 is converted into TFP   010_00000010_11100110
    FLOAT 11000000_01011100_00101000_11110110 is converted into TFP   110_00000010_11100001
    TFP   010_00000010_11100110 is converted into FLOAT 01000000_01011100_11000000_00000000
    TFP   110_00000010_11100001 is converted into FLOAT 11000000_01011100_00100000_00000000

[ Test 2: Addition ]
    010_00000010_11100110 + 110_00000010_11100001 = 001_11100001_00000000

[ Test 3: Multiplication ]
    010_00000010_11100110 * 110_00000010_11100001 = 110_00001001_11101111
